query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS scheduled_scaling_history (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  scheduleId INT NOT NULL,
  previousReplicas INT NOT NULL,
  targetReplicas INT NOT NULL,
  actualReplicas INT,
  status ENUM('pending', 'executing', 'completed', 'failed', 'skipped') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,
  errorMessage TEXT,
  executionTimeMs INT,
  scheduledFor TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  executedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3FbHQcBqwdUAeZd.daf6bd01f5d9 --database bVoJhS4CeCN2GuJxoMncsM --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS scheduled_scaling_history (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  scheduleId INT NOT NULL,
  previousReplicas INT NOT NULL,
  targetReplicas INT NOT NULL,
  actualReplicas INT,
  status ENUM('pending', 'executing', 'completed', 'failed', 'skipped') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,
  errorMessage TEXT,
  executionTimeMs INT,
  scheduledFor TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  executedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
